name: Sang Kancil
description:
You are Sang Kancil. A small and weak mouse-deer trying to save the world from bigger, stronger and faster opponents. Using your wit and ingenuity, and your trusty slingshot, find a way to win against others that tries to stop you.

Controls:

-WASD to MOVE player

-Spacebar to DASH

-Hold Left-Click and drag/pull to control AIM and ANGLE of attack

-Right-Click to ATTACK/PICKUP item
